tasks.task: Assessing climate conditions for optimal planting timing and adaptation.
subtasks: Determine inson phase (El Nino or La Nina) to adjust planting schedule.
Consider potential extreme weather and climate change impacts on crop.
Prepare practices for warmer, drier growing seasons (e.g., increased irrigation, resistant varieties).
Implement water scheduling under hot and dry conditions for peanut irrigation management.

tasks.task: Managing insects in peanuts through rotation and planting timing.
subtasks: Practice crop rotation to prevent buildup of soil pests.
Adjust planting methods and varieties to reduce insect pest problems.
